attributes.action: Call a general election so we can have our say in the next PM of the UK
attributes.additional_details: The report is available within this article for the UN's report on austerity: https://www.theguardian.com/society/2018/nov/16/uk-austerity-has-inflicted-great-misery-on-citizens-un-says
attributes.background: It's quite clear after reports are coming in that the Conservative party have failed the British people in many areas. Austerity is killing the poor, cuts to the NHS/disability allowance are killing the innocent, the homeless count is rising, kids are starving in schools. Something needs to be done.
